name: Paint Tanks
description:
Paint Tanks! Dodge the enemy, and drop bombs to blow them up!

Made for the MS Paint jam, using only MS Paint for all sprites, and only vocals for each sound!

5 levels of increasing difficulty!

Gfy footage

Changelog:

3/20:

Added Post-Jam Windows and Linux build. Paint_Tanks.exe is the jam version. Debian package tested to work on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS.

Fixed various audio issues

Added controls to main menu screen
